name: WANDA MAXIMOFF
text: “It’s all Wanda-ful here! The variety and quality of these Funko Pops are simply magical.”

name: TONY STARK
text: “It’s all Stark-tacular here! The quality and detail of these Funko Pops are simply genius-level.”

name: THOR ODINSON
text: “Truly thunderous! These Funko Pops wield the power of Asgard, a worthy addition.”

name: THE COLLECTOR
text: “A cosmic collection! Each Funko Pop is a universe of detail, curated for the most discerning of collectors.”

name: DR. STRANGE
text: “A mystic collection! Each piece is a spellbinding capture of the Sorcerer Supreme’s essence.”

name: LOKI
text: “Mischief managed! These Funko Pops are as cunning and detailed as the God of Mischief himself.”
